page.title: 05HOW WE LIVE A.SIDDIQUI
page.content: My name is Ayaz Siddiqui and I am writing about how people live. I live in a block of flats alled'Robert Owen House',which are opposite Henry Compton School.They are quite spacious and can easily house a family of four. Thre are three main types of housing, houses,flats and maisonettes.A house usually has two floors,with a living room,dining room and kitchen on the ground floor,and three bedrooms and a bathroom upstairs. There is only one level in a flat. A maisonette is a house divided into two flats witrh separate entrances.
